sentences.sentence: And they will feel brief moments of success as it comes, until they are eventually buried by the cumbersomeness of it, and then the next rocket of desire that is born is: "I'm wanting a simpler life."
sentences.translation: 当丰裕来临时，他们会感觉到短暂的成功时刻，直到他们最终被它的冗长和累赘所埋藏，然后下一个渴望之箭就产生了，那会是：“我想一种更平凡的生活。”
